Description: Number of beach day closures as recorded by the EPA Beach Closure Data
Target: 100 days free of any beach closures, representing the average length of the swimming season for the region

Description: Pounds of trash collected per person at the Ocean Conservancy’s International coastal cleanup day data
Target: Zero pounds of trash collected on all beaches on International Coastal Cleanup Day

Description: EPA's National Coastal Condition Assessment Water Quality Index status classifications
Target: All monitoring sites classified as in “Good” water quality condition

Description: EPA's National Coastal Condition Assessment Sediment Quality Index status classifications
Target: All monitoring sites classified as in “Good” sediment quality condition
